Title: Lady Lazarus
Plot: Megan has second thoughts about her future at Sterling, Cooper, Draper, Pryce. Peggy lashes out when she's inadvertently put in the uncomfortable position of having to lie. Pete's effort to protect an acquaintance doesn't turn out quite like he expected.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Alexis Bledel, Ben Feldman, Teyonah Parris, Jeff Clarke, Dennis Haskins, Jordan Feldman, Doug Tompos, James Sharpe, Molly Hawkey
